name: Spoiled Princess
description:
Spoiled Princess is a third person simple action RPG game with simple storyline. This game is not open world game. You'll travel from one map to another map to complete the story.

Story

You play as Watcher who is taking various jobs for a living. In this first episode, you have a quest to eliminate the spiders that had attacked the Crystal miners. And then the real story begins..

Game Info

Game duration : about 30 minutes

Controller partially support ( UI not supported )

This game has saving and loading system. 

Graphic Resolution : 480p, 720p, 1080p

Tested using Windows 10 64bit , Windows 11

Install Instruction

Download game zip file

Extract the zip file

Open SpoiledPrincess folder > Windows

Run SpoiledPrincess.exe (Application)

From Developer

This is our first game. If you guys found any bugs please kindly leave a comment. We really appreciate your effort to improve our game. Thanks in advance!
